goal: yourscience ltd is a technology transfer company working with medium to large companies as well as research centres. We promote technologies advancement in both the private and public sectors, by helping stakeholders in getting trustable knowledge of the proposed innovations
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Transport, Youth
